name: Eunice's Picante Chicken
ingredients: 2 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Brown the chicken on both sides in oil in a skillet large enough to hold all of the chicken in a single layer.
Combine picante sauce, Splenda, and Dijon mustard.
Pour sauce mixture over the chicken.
Cover and simmer until the chicken is cooked through.

notes: Makes 4 servings. Freezing not recommended. Nutritional information varies slightly depending on the type of Splenda used.
